trans-unit.source: Used by <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute"></xref> and <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedAggregateAttribute"></xref> to indicate the serialization format of a user-defined type (UDT) or aggregate.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute"></xref>和<xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedAggregateAttribute"></xref>表示使用者定義型別 (UDT) 或彙總的序列化格式。

trans-unit.source: Used by <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute> and <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedAggregateAttribute> to indicate the serialization format of a user-defined type (UDT) or aggregate.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute>和<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedAggregateAttribute>表示使用者定義型別 (UDT) 或彙總的序列化格式。</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedAggregateAttribute> </xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Native" name="Native" href=""></xref> serialization format uses a very simple algorithm that enables SQL Server to store an efficient representation of the UDT on disk.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Native" name="Native" href=""> </xref>序列化格式使用很簡單的演算法，可讓 UDT 的有效表示法儲存在磁碟上的 SQL Server。

trans-unit.source: Types marked for <xref uid="langword_csharp_Native" name="Native" href=""></xref> serialization can only have value types (structs in Microsoft Visual C# and structures in Microsoft Visual Basic .NET) as members.
trans-unit.target: 型別標示為<xref uid="langword_csharp_Native" name="Native" href=""></xref>只能序列化有實值類型 （結構在 Microsoft Visual C#） 和 Microsoft Visual Basic.NET 結構做為成員。

trans-unit.source: Members of reference types (such as classes in Visual C# and Visual Basic), either user-defined or those existing in the framework (such as <xref:System.String>), are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義或現有的 framework 中所參考的成員類型 （例如類別在 Visual C# 和 Visual Basic） (例如<xref:System.String>)，不支援。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The requirements for this format are: - The `StructLayout.LayoutKindSequential` attribute must be applied to the aggregate or UDT if it is defined in a class and not a structure.
trans-unit.target: 此格式的需求如下:-`StructLayout.LayoutKindSequential`屬性必須套用至彙總或 UDT，如果已定義類別而非以結構中。

trans-unit.source: This controls the physical layout of the data fields, and is used to force the members to be laid out sequentially in the order they appear.
trans-unit.target: 這會控制資料欄位的實際配置和用來強制執行循序配置它們出現的順序中的成員。

trans-unit.source: SQL Server uses this attribute to determine the field order for UDTs with multiple fields.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 會使用這個屬性來判斷之 Udt 的欄位順序與多個欄位。

trans-unit.source: - The type must contain at least one member (serialized values cannot be zero bytes in size).
trans-unit.target: -此類型必須包含至少一個成員 （序列化的值不能是零個位元組大小）。

trans-unit.source: - All the fields of the aggregate must be *blittable*, that is, they must have a common representation in both managed and unmanaged memory and not require special handling by the interop marshaler.
trans-unit.target: -彙總所有欄位都必須都是*blittable*，也就是說，它們必須在 managed 和 unmanaged 記憶體中有常見的表示法，而且不需要特殊處理，interop 封送處理器。

trans-unit.source: - All the fields of the UDT should be of one of the following types that can be serialized: `bool`, `byte`,`sbyte`,`short`,`ushort`, `int`, `uint`, `long`, `ulong`, `float`, `double`, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney>, or other value types defined by the user that contain fields of one of these types.
trans-unit.target: -UDT 的所有的欄位應該是可以序列化下列類型之一︰ `bool`， `byte`，`sbyte`，`short`，`ushort`， `int`， `uint`， `long`， `ulong`， `float`， `double`， <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte>， <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16>， <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32>， <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64>， <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime>， <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle>， <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble>， <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney>，或其他實值類型由使用者定義包含其中一個這些類型的欄位。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte>

trans-unit.source: - The aggregate must not specify a value for `MaxByteSize`.
trans-unit.target: -在彙總不可以指定的值`MaxByteSize`。

trans-unit.source: - The aggregate must not have any [NonSerialized] fields.
trans-unit.target: -在彙總必須沒有任何 [因此] 欄位。

trans-unit.source: - Fields must not be marked as an explicit layout (<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>).
trans-unit.target: -欄位不能標示為明確的配置 (<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>)。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The serialization format is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 未知的序列化格式。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_UserDefined" name="UserDefined" href=""></xref> serialization format gives the developer full control over the binary format through the <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.IBinarySerialize"></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_.Write" name=".Write" href=""></xref> and <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.IBinarySerialize"></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_.Read" name=".Read" href=""></xref> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_UserDefined" name="UserDefined" href=""> </xref>序列化格式可讓開發人員完全控制二進位格式，透過<xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.IBinarySerialize"> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_.Write" name=".Write" href=""> </xref>和<xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.IBinarySerialize"> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_.Read" name=".Read" href=""> </xref>方法。

trans-unit.source: The aggregate must specify a value for `MaxByteSize`.
trans-unit.target: 彙總都必須指定值`MaxByteSize`。

trans-unit.source: Specify the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute.IsByteOrdered%2A> attribute property.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute.IsByteOrdered%2A>屬性內容。</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute.IsByteOrdered%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 false。

trans-unit.source: If you omit any field in the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.IBinarySerialize.Read%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.IBinarySerialize.Write%2A> methods, the state of that field is not serialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果您省略任何欄位中的<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.IBinarySerialize.Read%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.IBinarySerialize.Write%2A>方法，該欄位的狀態不會序列化。</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.IBinarySerialize.Write%2A> </xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.IBinarySerialize.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
